summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of ForaTask multi-tenant SaaS application. All critical endpoints and subscription model methods tested successfully.

minor_issues.issue: Requires international format (+91...) instead of local format
minor_issues.impact: Users might be confused during registration

passed_tests: Company registration with automatic subscription creation and 90-day free trial
User login with subscription status information
Price calculator for different user counts (1, 3, 5, 7, 10, 15 users)
Master admin authentication with correct credentials
Master admin dashboard statistics (companies, users, subscriptions, MRR)
Master admin companies list with pagination and filtering
Master admin company details with subscription and payment history
Company restriction and unrestriction by master admin
Subscription status retrieval with all required fields
Payment creation returns 503 as expected (Razorpay not configured)
Subscription model calculateAmount() method for usage-based pricing
Subscription model getDaysUntilExpiry() method for trial management
Price calculation accuracy for base plan (₹249 for ≤5 users)
Price calculation accuracy for additional users (₹50 per user above 5)
Master admin seeding on server startup
